pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, April 21, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

St. Thomas, Ontario

Private meetings

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement with Premier of Ontario, Doug Ford, to welcome Volkswagen and PowerCo SE’s investment. A media availability will follow. The Minister of Innovation, Science and Industry, François-Philippe Champagne, will be in attendance.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:45 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

London, Ontario

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall with post-secondary students.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 2:00 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
